name: We Dread
description:
In this game, a man finds himself in a completely alien world. It's habitable. It's also scary, though. And the man has a crossbow.
So, what will You do next? Is there a peaceful solution, if WE, as any living creature, DREAD the unknown?

The hint: yes, there is. There's a good ending. Now, go and find it.

-----------------------

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse / Right Stick - Look around
  • W,A,S,D / Left Stick - Moving
  • Shift / Left Stick Clicked - Running
  • Left Mouse / Right Trigger - Fire

-----------------------

THE TEAM:
This game was created from scratch in just two days by DIVAN-Team: Dmitriy Prokopenko, Irina Chernyshova, Vladislav Momot, Azamat Kakharov and Nikita Andreyev. With love from SPL, a Saber studio located in Velikiy Novgorod!
